---
id: cache-cfwKv
title: CF Workers KV
sidebar_label: CF Workers KV
---

If you are using Mesh on Cloudflare Workers, you can use KV cache as a storage.

To get started with this caching strategy, install it:

<PackageInstall packages="@graphql-mesh/cache-cfkw" />

## How to use?

```yaml
cache:
  file:
    namespace: MY_MESH_CACHE
```

## Config API Reference

{@import ../generated-markdown/CFWorkersKVCacheConfig.generated.md}
